verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> was <S%G770>sick,<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> of <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary<s%> and her <S%G79>sister<s%> <S%G3136>Martha.<s%>

And it was the <S%G3137>Mary<s%> who <S%G218>anointed<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> with <S%G3464>ointment,<s%> and <S%G1591>wiped<s%> His <S%G4228>feet<s%> with her <S%G2359>hair,<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> was <S%G770>sick.<s%>
The <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> to Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2396>behold,<s%> he <S%G3739>whom<s%> You <S%G5368>love<s%> is <S%G770>sick.<s%>"

But when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> it, He <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> <S%G769>sickness<s%> is not unto <S%G2288>death,<s%> but for the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> by it."
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> and her <S%G79>sister,<s%> and <S%G2976>Lazarus.<s%>

<S%G5613>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> He <S%G191>heard<s%> that he was <S%G770>sick,<s%> He <S%G3306>stayed<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> [longer] in the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3739>where<s%> He was.
<S%G1899>Then<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "Let us <S%G71>go<s%> to <S%G2453>Judea<s%> <S%G3825>again.<s%>"

The <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4461>"Rabbi,<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G3568>just<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> to <S%G3034>stone<s%> You, and are You <S%G5217>going<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "Are <S%G1563>there<s%> not <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5610>hours<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%>? <S%G1437>If<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G4043>walks<s%> in the <S%G2250>day,<s%> he does not <S%G4350>stumble,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G991>sees<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>.
"But <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G4043>walks<s%> in the <S%G3571>night,<s%> he <S%G4350>stumbles,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> is not in him."

<S%G3778>This<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> and <S%G3326>after<s%> that He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Our <S%G5384>friend<s%> <S%G2976>Lazarus<s%> has <S%G2837>fallen<s%> <S%G2837>asleep;<s%> but I <S%G4198>go,<s%> that I may <S%G1852>awaken<s%> him out of <S%G1852>sleep.<s%>"
The <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he has <S%G2837>fallen<s%> <S%G2837>asleep,<s%> he will <S%G4982>recover.<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G3004>spoken<s%> of his <S%G2288>death,<s%> but they <S%G1380>thought<s%> that He was <S%G3004>speaking<s%> of <S%G2838>literal<s%> <S%G5258>sleep.<s%>
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them <S%G3954>plainly,<s%> <S%G2976>"Lazarus<s%> is <S%G599>dead,<s%>
and I <S%G5463>am<s%> <S%G5463>glad<s%> for your <S%G1223>sakes<s%> that I was not <S%G1563>there,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that you may <S%G4100>believe;<s%> but let us <S%G71>go<s%> to him. "

<S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> who is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1324>Didymus,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to [his] <S%G4827>fellow<s%> <S%G4827>disciples,<s%> "Let us <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G71>go,<s%> that we may <S%G599>die<s%> with Him."
<S%G3767>So<s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> He <S%G2147>found<s%> that he had <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2192>been<s%> in the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

and <S%G4183>many<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> had <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3136>Martha<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> to <S%G3888>console<s%> them <S%G4012>concerning<s%> [their] <S%G80>brother.<s%>

<S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> she <S%G191>heard<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G2064>coming,<s%> <S%G5221>went<s%> to <S%G5221>meet<s%> Him; but <S%G3137>Mary<s%> still <S%G2516>sat<s%> in the <S%G3624>house.<s%>

<S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> You had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> my <S%G80>brother<s%> would not have <S%G599>died.<s%>
<S%G2532>"Even<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3745>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> You <S%G154>ask<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G1325>give<s%> You."
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, "Your <S%G80>brother<s%> shall <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%>"
<S%G3136>Martha<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "I <S%G3609>know<s%> that he will <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again<s%> in the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> on the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, "I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> and the <S%G2222>life;<s%> he who <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Me shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2579>even<s%> <S%G2579>if<s%> he <S%G599>dies,<s%>
and <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G2198>lives<s%> and <S%G4100>believes<s%> in Me shall <S%G3756>never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G599>die.<s%> Do you <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>? "

She <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> I have <S%G4100>believed<s%> that You are the <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> [even] He who <S%G2064>comes<s%> into the <S%G2889>world.<s%>"

And when she had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> she <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away,<s%> and <S%G5455>called<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> her <S%G79>sister,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> <S%G2977>secretly,<s%> "The <S%G1320>Teacher<s%> is <S%G3918>here,<s%> and is <S%G5455>calling<s%> for you."

<S%G3767>Therefore,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was, she <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him, and <S%G4098>fell<s%> at His <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> You had <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5602>here,<s%> my <S%G80>brother<s%> would not have <S%G599>died.<s%>"

and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> have you <S%G5087>laid<s%> him?" They <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G3708>see.<s%>"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1145>wept.<s%>
And <S%G3767>so<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2396>"Behold<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> He <S%G5368>loved<s%> him!"

But <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G1410>"Could<s%> not <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man,<s%> who <S%G455>opened<s%> the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of him who was <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G4160>have<s%> <S%G4160>kept<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> from <S%G599>dying<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> being <S%G1690>deeply<s%> <S%G1690>moved<s%> <S%G1722>within,<s%> <S%G1438><s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3419>tomb.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> it was a <S%G4693>cave,<s%> and a <S%G3037>stone<s%> was <S%G1945>lying<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> it.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G142>"Remove<s%> the <S%G3037>stone.<s%>" <S%G3136>Martha,<s%> the <S%G79>sister<s%> of the <S%G5053>deceased,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> by <S%G2235>this<s%> <S%G2235>time<s%> there will be a <S%G3605>stench,<s%> for he has <S%G1510>been<s%> [dead] <S%G5066>four<s%> <S%G5066>days.<s%>"
<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, "Did I not <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4100>believe,<s%> you will <S%G3708>see<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>?"

"And I <S%G3609>knew<s%> that Thou <S%G191>hearest<s%> Me <S%G3842>always;<s%> but <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G4026>standing<s%> <S%G4026>around<s%> I <S%G3004>said<s%> it, that they may <S%G4100>believe<s%> that Thou didst <S%G649>send<s%> Me."

And when He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> He <S%G2905>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G2976>"Lazarus,<s%> <S%G1204>come<s%> <S%G1854>forth.<s%>"

<S%G4183>Many<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> who had <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G3137>Mary<s%> and <S%G2300>beheld<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> He had <S%G4160>done,<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in Him.
But <S%G5100>some<s%> of them <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> to the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> and <S%G3004>told<s%> them the things <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G4160>done.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G4863>convened<s%> a <S%G4892>council,<s%> and were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> are we <S%G4160>doing<s%>? For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G4160>performing<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4592>signs.<s%>

<S%G1437>"If<s%> we <S%G863>let<s%> Him [go on] <S%G3779>like<s%> <S%G3779>this,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men<s%> will <S%G4100>believe<s%> in Him, and the <S%G4514>Romans<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> our <S%G5117>place<s%> and our <S%G1484>nation.<s%>"

and not for the <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but that He might <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> into <S%G1520>one<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> who are <S%G1287>scattered<s%> <S%G1287>abroad.<s%>
<S%G3767>So<s%> from that <S%G2250>day<s%> on they <S%G1011>planned<s%> <S%G1011>together<s%> to <S%G615>kill<s%> Him.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> was at <S%G1451>hand,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up to <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> out of the <S%G5561>country<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> to <S%G48>purify<s%> <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>

<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> they were <S%G2212>seeking<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> as they <S%G2476>stood<s%> in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> do you <S%G1380>think;<s%> that He will not <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G1859>feast<s%> at <S%G3756>all<s%> <S%G3361><s%>?"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G1785>orders<s%> that <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> He was, he should <S%G3377>report<s%> it, that they might <S%G4084>seize<s%> Him.
